AyatArabic: إِنَّهُۥ لَا يُحِبُّ ٱلْمُسْتَكْبِرِينَ
AyatEnglish: Indeed, He does not like the arrogant.

AyatArabic: وَٱللَّهُ لَا يُحِبُّ كُلَّ مُخْتَالٍۢ فَخُورٍ
AyatEnglish: And Allah does not like every arrogant boaster.

AyatArabic: وَيْلٌۭ لِّلْمُطَفِّفِينَ
AyatEnglish: Woe to those who give less [than due].

AyatArabic: وَٱللَّهُ لَا يُحِبُّ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ
AyatEnglish: And Allah does not like the wrongdoers.

AyatArabic: فَأَعْقَبَهُمْ نِفَاقًۭا فِى قُلُوبِهِمْ إِلَىٰ يَوْمِ يَلْقَوْنَهُۥ بِمَآ أَخْلَفُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ مَا وَعَدُوهُ
AyatEnglish: So Allah caused hypocrisy to settle in their hearts until the Day they will meet Him because they failed Allah in what they promised.

AyatArabic: وَلَا تَعْثَوْا۟ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ مُفْسِدِينَ
AyatEnglish: And do not commit abuse on the earth, spreading corruption.

AyatArabic: وَٱعْدِلُوا۟ هُوَ أَقْرَبُ لِلتَّقْوَىٰ
AyatEnglish: Be just; that is nearer to righteousness.

AyatArabic: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يُحِبُّ ٱلْمُعْتَدِينَ
AyatEnglish: Verily, Allah does not like transgressors.

AyatArabic: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يُحِبُّ كُلَّ خَوَّانٍۢ أَثِيمٍۢ
AyatEnglish: Indeed, Allah does not like those who are treacherous and sinful.

AyatArabic: وَلَا تَقْرَبُوا۟ مَالَ ٱلْيَتِيمِ إِلَّا بِٱلَّتِى هِىَ أَحْسَنُ
AyatEnglish: And do not approach the property of an orphan, except in a way that is best.

AyatArabic: وَلَقَدْ أَرْسَلْنَا رُسُلًا إِلَىٰ قَوْمِهِمْ فَجَآءُوهُم بِٱلْبَيِّنَـٰتِ فَمَا كَانُوا۟ لِيُؤْمِنُوا۟
AyatEnglish: And We had certainly sent messengers to [their] people before you, and they came to them with clear proofs, but they were not to believe.

AyatArabic: فَوَيْلٌۭ لِّلَّذِينَ يَكْتُبُونَ ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ بِأَيْدِيهِمْ ثُمَّ يَقُولُونَ هَـٰذَا مِنْ عِندِ ٱللَّهِ
AyatEnglish: So woe to those who write the 'scripture' with their own hands, then say, 'This is from Allah.'

AyatArabic: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمْ ءَامِنُوا۟ كَمَآ ءَامَنَ ٱلنَّاسُ قَالُوٓا۟ أَنُؤْمِنُ كَمَآ ءَامَنَ ٱلسُّفَهَآءُ
AyatEnglish: And when they are told, 'Believe as the people have believed,' they say, 'Should we believe as the foolish have believed?'

AyatArabic: خُلِقَ ٱلْإِنسَـٰنُ مِنْ عَجَلٍ
AyatEnglish: Indeed, man was created of haste.

AyatArabic: وَمَن يُشْرِكْ بِٱللَّهِ فَكَأَنَّمَا خَرَّ مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ
AyatEnglish: And whoever associates with Allah – it is as though he had fallen from the sky.

AyatArabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ يُحِبُّونَ أَن تَشِيعَ ٱلْفَـٰحِشَةُ فِى ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ لَهُمْ عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٌۭ
AyatEnglish: Indeed, those who like that immorality should be spread among those who have believed will have a painful punishment.

AyatArabic: وَٱخْفِضْ لَهُمَا جَنَاحَ ٱلذُّلِّ مِنَ ٱلرَّحْمَةِ
AyatEnglish: And lower to them the wing of humility out of mercy.

AyatArabic: ٱلَّذِينَ إِذَا ٱكْتَالُوا۟ عَلَى ٱلنَّاسِ يَسْتَوْفُونَ
AyatEnglish: Those who, when they have to receive by measure from men, demand full measure.

AyatArabic: وَيَمْنَعُونَ ٱلْمَاعُونَ
AyatEnglish: And they prevent [others] from helping.

AyatArabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ فَتَنُوا۟ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ وَٱلْمُؤْمِنَـٰتِ ثُمَّ لَمْ يَتُوبُوا۟ فَلَهُمْ عَذَابُ جَهَنَّمَ
AyatEnglish: Indeed, those who have tortured the believing men and believing women and then have not repented will have the punishment of Hell.
